jellyfin/jellyfin-ffmpeg

Jellyfin-FFmpeg is a custom FFmpeg build with tweaks for Jellyfin media server transcoding and device support

View on index

Related repos

  • Desktop client with embedded MPV player
  • Streams audio from Jellyfin servers to mobile devices
  • Video client for Jellyfin using VLC
  • third-party Jellyfin client for Linux, supports music and video playback
  • Imports YouTube content into Jellyfin
  • Java wrapper for FFmpeg CLI
